CustomField.description: An Account is "Unengaged" if it has no open new product customer opportunities.
CustomField.formula: IF( Customer_Status__c = "Customer", IF( Products_left_to_sell__c = 0, "Customer All Products", IF( NPC_Opportunities_Revised__c> 0, "Engaged Customer", "Unengaged Customer" ) ), IF( NPC_Opportunities_Revised__c> 0, "Engaged Non-Customer", "Unengaged Non-Customer" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An Account is "Unengaged" if it has no open new product customer opportunities.
CustomField.label: Unengaged Status
